label: Instructions
description: # Vertical Grid Properties Documentation\n\nThis template documents vertical grid specifications as compound objects referenced by model components. Based on EMD Section 4.2 requirements.

label: Coordinate
description: The coordinate type of the vertical grid.\n\nMANDATORY field from Coordinate CV.

label: Description (Optional)
description: Free-text description of the vertical grid.\n\nOPTIONAL field.
placeholder: Additional vertical grid details if needed

label: N z
description: Number of grid cells in Z direction.\n\nOPTIONAL integer field. Must be omitted if n_z_range is set.

label: N z Range
description:
Minimum and maximum number of Z grid cells for variable resolution.

OPTIONAL field as [integer,integer]. Must be omitted if n_z is set.

Format: min, max

label: Bottom Layer Thickness
description: Thickness of bottom model layer.\n\nOPTIONAL float field.

label: Top Layer Thickness
description: Thickness of top model layer.\n\nOPTIONAL float field.

label: Top of Model
description: Value of upper boundary of top model layer.\n\nOPTIONAL float field.

label: Vertical Units
description: Physical units for thickness and boundary values.\n\nOPTIONAL field - Required if any thickness/boundary values are set.

label: Issue Type
description: This is pre-set and cannot be changed.

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
